resources.string: You\'re watching on unofficial ClubHouse application for devices witch using 🤖 Android OS.

Anyone can join with an invite from an exiting user - or reserve your username and we\'ll text you if you have a friend on the app who can let you in. We are so grateful you\'re here and can\'t wait to have you join! 🙏
By entering your number, you\'re agreeing to official ClubHouse Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.You can read them in official app or website before agreeing. Thanks!
Enter the code ClubHouse just texted you
Didn\'t receive it? Tap on Resend code button!
